name: Martin B. H. Weiss
content: Martin B.H. Weiss - Home Martin B.H. Weiss I am faculty member in the telecommunications and undergraduate programs in the School of Information Sciences at the University of Pittsburgh. I am also Associate Dean for Academic Affairs and Research for SIS.
